sentence.Network_en: The priest wore a purple vestment to conduct the funeral services.
sentence.Network_cn: 牧师穿上紫色法衣主持葬礼仪式.

sentence.Network_en: Cope: a long ecclesiastical vestment worn over an alb or surplice.
sentence.Network_cn: 长袍: 一种传教士所穿的长袍,穿在白长袍或白法衣外面.

sentence.Network_en: With all the deals last year, in vestment investment banks did well.
sentence.Network_cn: 纵观去年所有交易, 投资银行做得很好.

list.abs: in a quiet , the 11 judges dressed in black vestments and dignity into the court , seat board .在一片肃静中，11名法官身着黑色法衣威严地走入法庭，登上审判席。
dressed in ceremonial garments especially clerical vestment ., 穿着仪式上的衣服 , 特别是指牧师的礼服.
modification of foreign in vestment agreements ., 外国投资协议的修改.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French vestiment, from Latin vestimentum, from vestire 'clothe' (see vest)

means.word_mean: 1. gown (especially ceremonial garments) worn by the clergy

stems_affixes.word_buile: invest[v.投资,投入]+ment表名词→n.投资,投资额
vest衣服→n.背心,马甲;汗衫,内衣
vest衣服+ment物→n.[作礼拜时教士的]法衣,官服
di离开,去掉+vest衣服→去掉衣服→剥夺
in进+vest衣服→把衣服中的钱放入事业中→投资
